scope.name: https://www.googleapis.com/auth/gmail.modify
scope.role: Read, compose, and send emails from your Gmail account

scope.name: https://www.googleapis.com/auth/gmail.readonly
scope.role: View your email messages and settings

scope.name: https://www.googleapis.com/auth/gmail.metadata
scope.role: View your email message metadata such as labels and headers, but not the email body

scope.name: https://www.googleapis.com/auth/gmail.labels
scope.role: See and edit your email labels

scope.name: https://www.googleapis.com/auth/gmail.insert
scope.role: Add emails into your Gmail mailbox

scope.name: https://mail.google.com/
scope.role: Read, compose, send, and permanently delete all your email from Gmail [Full Access]

scope.name: https://www.googleapis.com/auth/gmail.settings.basic
scope.role: See, edit, create, or change your email settings and filters in Gmail

scope.name: https://www.googleapis.com/auth/gmail.settings.sharing
scope.role: Manage your sensitive mail settings, including who can manage your mail

setup.name: selected_scopes
setup.label: Scopes
setup.message: Add comma seperated scopes for accessing Gmail's api endpoints

requests.text: Array of API requests to batch process. Each request should include method, path, and body/params as needed

meta.description: Combines multiple API calls into a single HTTP request to reduce the number of HTTP connections

raw.text: RFC 2822 formatted and base64url encoded string

snippet.text: A short part of the message text

meta.description:
Send email Gamil uses RFC 2822 formatted, base64url encoded string as a payload for sending email. To, From, Subject, CC, BCC, ReplyTo gets formatted as per RFC 2822 and gets converted to base64string ``` // RFC2822 payload format From: Name To: hello@example.com Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8 MIME-Version: 1.0 Subject: =?utf-8?B?SGVsbG8=?=

This is email

``` ### Sending Quota You can send 100* email per day on free gmail account. You can send 1500 - 2000* email per day on Google workspace account. More details [https://developers.google.com/apps-script/guides/services/quotas](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/guides/services/quotas)

raw.text: RFC 2822 formatted and base64url encoded string

payload.text: The parsed email structure in the message parts

snippet.text: A short part of the message text

meta.description:
Send email with attachments Gamil uses RFC 2822 formatted, base64url encoded string as a payload for sending email. To, From, Subject, CC, BCC, ReplyTo gets formatted as per RFC 2822 and gets converted to base64string ``` // RFC2822 payload format From: Name To: hello@example.com Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8 MIME-Version: 1.0 Subject: =?utf-8?B?SGVsbG8=?=

This is email

``` ### Sending Quota You can send 100* email per day on free gmail account. You can send 1500 - 2000* email per day on Google workspace account. More details [https://developers.google.com/apps-script/guides/services/quotas](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/guides/services/quotas)
